1.name: Elementalist
1.details:
As a master of all elements, Mystic can combine 2 of her 4 abilities to cast a spell. The combination can be either unique or duplicated. In addition, each cast of her spells gains a stack with the same name for 3 seconds (maximum 5 stacks for each spell, and 10 stacks overall).

Rune increases her magical power.
Nature increases her movement speed.
Arcane increases her resistance.
Mystic increases her magic penetration.

However, she cannot use the same spell within 12 seconds. Enemies who are impaired by Mystic's abilities gain 50% tenacity from her spells afterwards.

2.name: Rune
2.details:
Rune / Rune - Runic Flare - Mystic will cast a blast of fire to a target direction, exploding on the first target hit, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all nearby enemies.

Rune / Nature - Runic Stone - Mystic will summon sharp edge rock from the ground, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) in a target direction. The terrain then stays there and briefly slows all enemies' movement speed.

Rune / Arcane - Runic Gust - Mystic will cast a tornado in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and slightly knocking up all enemies in the path.

Rune / Mystic - Runic Shadow - Mystic will cast a darkened blast to a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies in its path and lowering their resistance for 3 seconds.

3.name: Nature
3.details:
Nature / Nature - Nature Blessing - Mystic will cast a healing spell on herself or an allied Challenger, healing a small amount (scaling with magical power) instantly.

Nature / Rune - Nature Wrath - Mystic will summon the plant to root down a target for 1.5 seconds, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power).

Nature / Arcane - Nature Energy - Mystic will cast an enchanting spell on herself or an allied Challenger, increasing his / her movement speed for 2 seconds.

Nature / Mystic - Nature Wave - Mystic will send a wave of water to an enemy, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to the target. The wave then returns to her and becomes a water barrier, shielding her for 3 seconds.

4.name: Arcane
4.details:
Arcane / Arcane - Arcane Flux - Mystic will summon a field of arcane energy, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) after a short delay. If 3 or more enemies are struck by the spell, Ciarra will gain half of the mana cost back.

Arcane / Rune - Arcane Lightning - Mystic will summon a thunderbolt to strike at a target area, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power). Additional enemies getting hit within the area will increase the damage by 20% each (maximum 100%).

Arcane / Nature - Arcane Frost - Mystic will summon a field of blizzard, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) every half of a second for 4 seconds. Enemies within the area are also briefly slowed.

Arcane / Mystic - Arcane Abyss - Mystic will cast a mysterious field that is linked to the abyss, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and silencing all enemies within. The field stays for 4 seconds.

5.name: Mystic
5.details:
Mystic / Mystic - Mystical Void - Mystic will summon a dark orb that will turn into a dark hole, sucking all nearby enemies to the center while dealing a large amount of magical damage (scaling with magical power).

Mystic / Rune - Mystical Darkness - Mystic will cast a shroud of darkness at a target area that constantly deals magical damage (scaling with magical power) for 3 seconds. The shroud will slowly expand, reducing vision of all enemies within.

Mystic / Nature - Mystical Sea - Mystic will cast a huge wave of tsunami in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit and knocking them up.

Mystic / Arcane - Mystical Surge - Mystic will cast a bolt of mystical energy, bouncing between enemies several times while dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) for each bounce. If the bolt kills a unit, its power will be increased by 10% on the next bounce (maximum 60%).
